entry.title: 4 Bar LED mobile DJ lighting system
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 289.90

 

The PartyBar System is an exciting all-in-one LED Wash system for mobile entertainers bands and stage lighting. This lighting system features a 4-head bar light system each with 3 Tri-RGB 9-Watt LEDs. This 3 / 15-channel DMX system includes a two-pedal foot switch, adjustable tripod, packing bag and transport case.

The 4 Par Can system is a pack-and-go must have for DJs, bands and other performers who want a complete LED wash light system. It produces saturated color washes of light with LEDs rated at an extremely long life of 50,000 hours.

Main Features: 

Portable system of four LED par can lights. Dynamic ready-to-go lighting for stage performance or parties

  •  Can be mounted on the supplied tripod stand or be floor mounted for uplighting effects
  •  0 - 20Hz strobe rate.
  •  Sound-to-Light / Auto / DMX / Foot Swithc Color Mixing
  •  4 X 3 X Tri-9W RGB LED Diodes
  •  Ideal for all forms of performance including bands, stage, DJs or parties
  •  Run all night - no duty cycle
  •  Set up and ready to rock the party in minutes! 
  •  Power consumption: 55W maximum
  •  Long life LEDs (50,000 hr. rating)
  •  Dimensions (LxWxH):: 36” x 9.5” x 18 ”  (91.00 x 24.00 x 4.80 cm) • Weight: 22 lbs (10.0 kg).

Complete kit include: 4 LED Par Cans / Tripod Lighting Stand / Foot-Switch Controller / Power Cord / ParCan Bag / Stand Bag

entry.title: Micky Series Wash Light - 40W LED Moving Head Wash Light RGBAW+UV 6-in-1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yellow River
Type:
Price: 362.90

 

A very compact Micky moving head wash light with bright output. The 4x 10-watt 6-in-1 RGBAW+UV LED produces 25° wash spread and pure richly saturated color mixing effect. 

This Yellow River moving head works both in DMX or stand-alone mode. In stand-alone mode you can choose between an automatic or sound controlled mode. When operating in DMX mode you have complete control with 15 DMX channels. Among it's features are an adjustable strobe speed (up to 10 times/second), 0-100% linear dimmer and 8bit / 16bit X/Y movement functions .

Main Features: 
  • Head movement: Pan 540°, Tilt 220°
  • 25° beam angle
  • 4x 10Watts - 6in1 RGBAW+UV (Red Green Blue Amber White + Blacklight) LED
  • 15 DMX channels
  • DMX and Stand-alone mode
  • Automatic and music controlled
  • Adjustable strobe speed (0-10 times/second)
  • 0-100% Linear Smooth Dimming
  • 8bit 16bit X/Y movement control (65536 steps accurate positioning) 
  • Automatic pan/tilt correction
  • Reset function
  • Control panel with LED display
  • DMX in/output via 3-pin XLR
  • Dimensions (LxWxH):7.9"x7.7"x12.5" (20x19.5x31.8cm) • Weight: 7.7 lbs (3.5kg)

entry.title: Micky Series Beam RGBW - 60W LED Beam Moving Head RGBW 4-in-1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yellow River
Type:
Price: 439.90

 

A very compact Micky moving head beam light with bright output. The 60W QUAD RGBW 4in1 LED produces a narrow 2.5° beam. It is the first real RGBW beam light in the entertainment industry as all previous multi-color beam lights the different color diodes are separated. With the combination of the Advanced Lens (94mm diameter) and the latest multi chip LED technology, this fixture delivers magical effects of brightness of 6010 LUX @5meter and 1150LUX @10meter.

This Yellow River moving head works both in DMX or stand-alone mode. In stand-alone mode you can choose between an automatic or sound controlled mode. When operating in DMX mode you have complete control with 14 DMX channels. Among it's features are an adjustable strobe speed (up to 10 times/second), 0-100% linear dimmer and 8bit / 16bit X/Y movement functions .

Main Features: 
  • Head movement: Pan 540°, Tilt 220°
  • Super-sharp 2.5° beam angle
  • 60W QUAD RGBW LED
  • 14 DMX channels
  • DMX and Stand-alone mode
  • Automatic and music controlled
  • Adjustable strobe speed (0-10 times/second)
  • 0-100% Linear Smooth Dimming
  • 8bit 16bit X/Y movement control (65536 steps accurate positioning) 
  • Automatic pan/tilt correction
  • Reset function
  • Control panel with LED display
  • DMX in/output via 3-pin XLR
  • Dimensions (LxWxH):7.9"x7.7"x12.5" (20x19.5x31.8cm) • Weight: 7.7 lbs (3.5kg).

entry.title: Micky Series Spot - 40W LED Spot Moving Head
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 439.90

 

A very compact Micky moving head spot with bright output. The 40W LED produces a 9° beam. The moving head is equipped with both a color and gobo wheel for ultimate control. The gobo wheel has 9 different gobos + open and the color wheel has 7 colors + white. This Yellow River moving head works both in DMX or stand-alone mode. In stand-alone mode you can choose between an automatic or sound controlled mode. When operating in DMX mode you have complete control with 11 DMX channels. Among it's features are an adjustable strobe speed, 0-100% dimmer and a gobo shake effect.

Main Features: 
  • Head movement: Pan 540°, Tilt 220°
  • 40W white LED
  • 11 DMX channels
  • DMX and Stand-alone mode
  • Automatic and music controlled
  • 9 Gobos + open
  • Gobo shake effect
  • 7 Colors + white
  • Adjustable strobe speed
  • 0-100% Dimmer
  • Automatic pan/tilt correction
  • Reset function
  • Manual focus
  • Control panel with LED display
  • DMX in/output via 3-pin XLR
  • Dimensions (LxWxH):7.9"x7.7"x11.6" (20x19.5x29.5cm) • Weight: 8.8 lbs (4kg).

entry.title: Mini Moving Head LED Wash Light - 7*Tri-RGB
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 259.90

 Mini moving head powered by an group of seven energy-efficient Tri-RGB LEDs. It allows for DMX control in 8 and 14-channel modes and standalone operation with automated programs and sound activation to the beat of the music. An LED display of Mode, Enter, Value Up and Value Down keys provide easy manual control. This is our most economical led moving head wash light of all in the market.

Main Features: 
  •  Mini moving head dj lights 7*Tri-RGB LED (Red Green Blue)
  •  Convenient access to static colors and RGB color mixing with or without DMX
  •  X-Axis 540° Y-Axis 180° rotation.
  •  8 built in auto running programs.
  •  8/14 DMX channels: all controllable X-Y movement, pulse lighting or color mixing.
  •  Four control modes available: Auto/Sound/DMX/Master-slave.
  •  0-100% Dimming.
  •  Dimensions (LxWxH):: 6.7” x 6.1” x 10.5 ”  (16.90 x 15.50 x 26.70 cm) • Weight: 7.0 lbs (3.2 kg).

entry.title: LED Wash Bar Light 8X4in1 10W RGBW
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 229.90

 

This RGBW wash bar  is an exceptional linear wash fixture loaded with 9x 10-watt Quad-Color RGBW LEDs, and built for ease of use and excellent color reproduction in a variety of situations. Quad-color (4-in-1) RGBW LED’s provide a vastly increased color and drastically reduced multicolored shadowing versus conventional LEDs, and programming is a snap with the large LED control panel.

Main Features: 

  • Red, green, blue and whilte LEDs create mixing of colors
  • Quad-color LED technology: Smooth RGBW mix with no multi colored shadows
  • All connectors placed on opposite sides of the fixture for easy daisy-chaining
  • Dimmer: Full range 0-100% general & for all four colors
  • Strobe effect
  • Flicker free
  • Noise free model

entry.title: Magik PAR - LED SlimPar Can 9X5in1 RGBAW
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 269.90

Powerful 5-in-1 (RGBWA) low profile LED wash light with 9* 10 watt LEDs. Deliver bold and brilliant color mixing with smooth and even outputs without shadows for professional production and mobile entertainment. Save time programming by power linking multiple units together and easily triggering the built-in automatic and sound activated shows.

Main Features: 

  • 10 Built-in automated programs via master/slave
  • Red, green, blue, whilte and amber LEDs create thousands mixings of colors
  • Strobe effect
  • Power In/Out for powering linking up to 5 units (@110V)
  • DMX In/Out for linking up to 30 units.
  • Flicker free
  • No heat, noise free.
  • Par Can dimension: 265*295*88 mm (10.4*11.6*3.5"), 2.7kg (6 lbs)

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 129.90

The SlimPar 4X4in1 is an indoor LED Par powered by 4 x 4-in-1 8W LEDs, sporting quad-color LED technology that enables a smooth RGBW mix with no multicolor shadows. Provided with a 28º beam angle and 0-100% electronic dimming. It is an excellent tool for creating stunning ambiances and gives you great flexibility with its 10 pre-built programs and 5 operational Modes (DMX-512, M/S, Auto run, built-in programs, static colors).

Main Features: 

  • 10 Built-in automated programs via master/slave
  • Red, green, blue and whilte LEDs create billions of colors
  • Quad-color LED technology: Smooth RGBW mix with no multi colored shadows
  • Dimmer: Full range 0-100% general & for all four colors

  • Power In/Out for powering linking up to 16 units (@110V)
  • DMX In/Out for linking up to 30 units.
  • Flicker free

Extremely high-powered LED slim PAR in a black, metal housing. Utilizing state of art heat dissipation technology SlimPar Can seriesis fan-free, which makes it super quiet for various applications.

This 15X4in1 model has a total of 15 quad LEDs (RGBW), thusguaranteeing perfect mixing of solid and pastel colors – including white. Witha power consumption of just 120 watts, the 8-watt quad LEDs produce animpressive level of brightness with a beam angle of 28 degrees.

This unit can be operated standalone using four buttons and an LED display on the back.

entry.title: 177 x 10mm LED Par 64 Can - RGBA Wash Light
entry.summary:
Vendor: ColorX
Type: LED Stage
Price: 98.90

 

Slim wash light featuring red, green, blue and amber LEDs. The addition of amber offers a more complete spectrum in some of the harder-to-create warm colors and also punches up the saturation and vividness of colors in general. This unit is perfect for adding a lot of color to small performance venues. Bright, brilliant and sharp effect. 

Lamp: 177 X 10mm LEDs  (R30, G48, B54, A45). 

Punchy amber LEDs help generate many additional colors and natural color temperatures. Great for small bands, weddings, church uplighting.

Main Features:
  • Built-in automated programs via master/slave
  • Red, green, blue and amber LEDs create billions of colors
  • Includes amber LEDs to boost CRI and offer a wider spectrum of colors
  • Perfect for Mobile, Club, Wedding and Church uplighting applications
  • Built-in dimming curves simulate existing lighting and offer super-smooth LED fading
  • Great for quiet installations thanks to the 100% silent operation and no moving parts
  • Power In/Out for powering linking up to 15 units (@110V)
  • DMX In/Out for linking up to 30 units.
  • Easy to setup and use
  • No heat, noise free.
  • Light weight: only 1.6Kg. Portable, and convenient to use.

entry.title: 240 x 10 mm LED RGBA Color Wash Light Bar Light
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 149.90

Multi-purpose slim light wash bar for use in clubs and discos, for stages and interior design, wedding or church lighting. It is equipped with 252 durable, high-performance 10mm LEDs in red, green, blue and amber, which provide a brilliant, uniform illumination in the basic colors and any combinations with a defined beam angle of 35°.

The light bar can be controlled via 3, 6 or 32 DMX channels or operated in standalone mode. It is operated using the mode, input, up and down buttons with an LCD display, and comes with a built-in microphone for sound control.

The bar can be locked in position using the two mounting brackets, and two eyelets are used for suspension and securing. Input and output jacks for power and DMX on both ends make it possible to control multiple light bars in series. 

Main Features: 
  • 240 powerful, long-life 10 mm RGBA LEDs
  • RGBA for warm, rich color mixing
  • 8 independently controllable segments
  • 24 built-in programs
  • Integrated microphone for sound control
  • Simple to operate using the four buttons and LED display
  • Power consumption: 25W maximum
  • Dimensions (LxWxH):: 42.3” x 2.6” x 3.4 ” (107.50 x 6.50 x 8.60 cm) • Weight: 4.1 lbs (1.9 kg).

entry.title: Cold White LED Strobe Light - 24W
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 129.90

 

High-quality LED strobe light with 108 PCs of 5050 white LED chips and 120° beam angle for large area coverage. It allows for DMX, master/slave and standalone operation with strobe, dimmer and sound activation modes. The flash rate is adjustable from 1 to 20 flashes per second for an intense strobe effect. Mode, Set, Up and Down keys and a 3-digit LED display permit easy manual control. This compact lightweight strobe light is easily portable, and an adjustable bracket provides multiple mounting options.

Main Features: 
  • Powerful 108 x 5050 Cold White LEDs
  • Low power consumption – only 24W
  • Flash-rate adjustable (1-20 flashes/sec)
  • Operated via DMX, in master/slave mode or standalone mode
  • 120° Wide beam angle
  • Integrated microphone for sound control
  • Simple to operate using the four buttons and LED display
  • Universal mounting bracket included
  • Compact, sturdy metal housing
  • Dimensions (LxWxH): 14.2” x 6.2” x 3.3” (36.00 x 15.70 x 8.50 cm) • Weight: 3.7 lbs (1.7 kg)

entry.title: Waterproof LED Architectural Color Washer Bar - 14*Tri-3W RGB
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 289.90

 

The ColorX Lotus Series - 14X 3W outdoor wash light bar features Tri-Color LEDs for seamless color mixing. It has built in color switching, fading and pattern sequencing facilities which are perfect for architectural installations. A range of features can be either manually controlled through back panel or DMX controlled from any of the DMX controllers. This outdoor DMX LED flood can present very smooth and bright lighting effect as an architectural wall wash or for outdoor performance stages.

Main Features: 
  •  Engery saving 44W outdoor RGB wall washer. 
  •  Convenient access to static colors and RGB color mixing with or without DMX
  •  Four control modes available: Auto Bulit-in programs / DMX / Master-slave / Static color.
  •  Built-in automated programs: color fading, color hopping, single color gradual change etc.
  •  0-100% Dimming.
  •  3-pin XLR input and output connectors. DMX linking up to 30 PCs.
  •  Power In/Out for linking up to 10 units (@110V).
  •  IP65 waterproof designed for outdoor applications. 
  •  Robust housing repels water, snow, dirt, sand and salt for all-weather applications.
  •  Adjustable beam direction: 180 degrees tunable.
  •  Dimensions (LxWxH):: 12” x 5.1” x 4.1 ”  (30.00 x 13.00 x 11.00 cm) • Weight: 5 lbs (2.3 kg).

entry.title: DMX 512 Controller - 12 Lights 16CH 240 Scenes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 129.90

Control up to 12 intelligent lights with up to 16-channels of DMX data with this 16-Channel DMX-512 Controller.

This compact controller gives you access to up to 6 sets of chases with up to 240 scenes each. It is able to execute multiple chases at the same time and includes beat-activation, tap sync, and auto run functions.

  • Universal DMX-512 controller
  • Controls 12 intelligent lights of up to 16 channels
  • 30 banks of 8 scenes, 240 scenes total
  • 6 sets of chases containing 240 scenes
  • Execute multiple chases simultaneously
  • Re-assignable channels
  • Wheel assignable Pan/Tilt and 16-bit control
  • Built in microphone for music triggering
  • Beat-activation, tap sync, auto run
  • Grab any fixture on the fly
  • Polarity selector
  • MIDI compatible
  • Size:  19.0” x 7.5” x 3.5”  (48.0 x 19.0 x 9.0 cm)
  • Net Weight: 5.8 lbs (2.6 kg).
